metadata.title: CVE-2017-8315 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Eclipse XML parser for the Eclipse IDE versions 2017.2.5 and earlier wasfound vulnerable to an XML External Entity attack. An attacker can exploitthe vulnerability by implementing malicious code on Androidmanifest.xml.

criterions.comment: apktool: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
